text: Bethany Joy Lenz (born April 2, 1981) is an American actress, singer- songwriter and filmmaker. She played Haley James Scott on The CW's television series One Tree Hill. She also played Michelle Bauer Santos in CBS' soap opera Guiding Light. Lenz' first professional job was in a commercial for dolls from the teen drama series Swans Crossing. She also appeared in commercials for Dr. Pepper and Eggo. Lenz was born in Hollywood, Florida. title: Bethany Joy Lenz
